title: 1929년 Prospere 사건
summary: 미국 Florida, FL 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Prospere. 판결일: 1929-09-27. 법원: Supreme Court of Florida.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Bertha W. Prospere, Et Al., Appellants, v. City of New Port Richey, Et Al., Appellees
**판결일**: 1929-09-27
**법원**: Supreme Court of Florida
**관할**: Florida, FL

**판사**: Brown, Buford, Ellis, Strum, Terrell, Whitfield

## 변호인

J. Franklin Spears and J. C. Davant,  for Appellants;

 Arthur L. Auvil,  for Appellees.

## 인용

- 124 So. 2
- 98 Fla. 508

## 판결문 요약

My views as to the proportion of the cost of paving streets that may be specially assessed against the abutting property, and as to the method of determining and assessing such costs, are fully stated in Atlantic Coast Line v. City of Lakeland, on re-petition for rehearing, 115 So. R. 683, which views were concurred in by a majority of the court.
This bill of complaint makes a prima facie case for relief within the views expressed in the Lakeland case, as well as within the authorities cited in the foregoing opinion. *Page 513 ...

sources.name: Harvard Law - Case Law Access Project
